price: 122. Waxaase doortay Rabbigiis wuuna ka toobad aqbalay oo hanuuniyey.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
